Class Board

java.lang.Object
util.Observable
model.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Board extends util.Observable implements Serializable
This class represents the Board of the game

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board(int numOfPlayers)

      Constructor of the class Board. It initializes the livingRoomBoard by calling:
      - setNumOfCells(int numOfPlayers)
      - initializeBoard(int numOfPlayers) methods.

      Parameters:
      numOfPlayers - an integer, it represents the number of players of the Game

  • Method Details

    • setUpBoard

      public boolean setUpBoard(ArrayList<Tile> tilesToPutOnBoard) throws NullPointerException

      This method is used to add a specific number of tiles to the board. After the board has been filled the observers are notified with a message, stating that livingRoomBoard has been modified.

      Parameters:
      tilesToPutOnBoard - is an ArrayList of Tile that represents the tile that will be added to the Board
      Returns:
      true if the board has been successfully set up, false otherwise
      Throws:
      NullPointerException

    • initializeBoard

      public void initializeBoard(int nOfPlayers)

      This method is called by the constructor Board(int numOfPlayers). Based on the number of players it sets the disposition of the blocked tiles. It also fills the board (where there are no blocked tiles) with nothing tiles.

      Parameters:
      nOfPlayers - an integer that represents the number of players

    • setNumOfCells

      public void setNumOfCells(int nOfPlayers)

      This method sets the number of cells that can be used during the game (using the nOfPlayers).

      Parameters:
      nOfPlayers - an integer that represents the number of players in game

    • removeTile

      public Tile removeTile(int row, int column)

      Given two parameters (the coordinates of the tile that has to be removed), this method returns the Tile that has been selected and substitutes the tile with a nothing tile.
      After a tile has been removed the observers are notified with a message.

      Parameters:
      row - is an integer that represents the coordinate of the row
      column - is an integer that represents the coordinate of the column
      Returns:
      a Tile

    • getBoard

      public Tile[][] getBoard()

      Method used to get the disposition of the tiles on the Board.

      Returns:
      a matrix of tiles

    • getNumOfCells

      public int getNumOfCells()

      Method used to get the number of available cells of the Board.

      Returns:
      an integer that represents the number of available cells

    • checkBoardStatus

      public boolean checkBoardStatus()

      This method returns true if board needs to be filled, false otherwise.

      Returns:
      true if board needs to be filled, false otherwise

    • getSelectedType

      public Type getSelectedType(int row, int column)

      This method returns the Type of a selected Tile (selected using the two parameters row and column).

      Parameters:
      row - is an integer that represents the coordinate of the row
      column - is an integer that represents the coordinate of the column
      Returns:
      the Type of the selected tile

    • getSelectedNumType

      public int getSelectedNumType(int row, int column)

      Method that returns the number of the selected Tile Type (selected using the two parameters row and column).

      Parameters:
      row - is an integer that represents the coordinate of the row
      column - is an integer that represents the coordinate of the column
      Returns:
      an integer in between 0 and 3
